help.title: Help & Support
help.subtitle: FLM application usage, frequently asked questions, and troubleshooting

faq1.question: What is FLM?
faq1.answer: FLM (Local LLM API Management Tool) is a desktop application that allows you to create and use local LLM APIs without technical knowledge or writing code.

faq2.question: Is FLM free?
faq2.answer: Yes, FLM is free to use. It is an open source project.

faq3.question: Which OS does it run on?
faq3.answer: Currently, it mainly supports Windows. Support for macOS and Linux is planned for the future.

faq4.question: What are the system requirements?
faq4.answer: OS: Windows 10 or higher (recommended: Windows 11), Memory: 8GB or more (recommended: 16GB or more), Storage: 10GB or more free space (additional space may be required depending on the model), CPU: 64-bit processor

faq5.question: What is Ollama?
faq5.answer: Ollama is a tool for running LLMs (Large Language Models) locally. FLM uses Ollama to provide LLM APIs.

faq6.question: Do I need to install Ollama?
faq6.answer: No, it's not necessary. FLM will automatically download and install Ollama. If it's already installed, FLM will use that.

faq7.question: Which model should I choose?
faq7.answer: For beginners, please select the recommended model (highlighted on screen). For chat: llama3:8b, mistral:7b, etc. For code generation: codellama:7b, deepseek-coder:6.7b, etc. For lightweight models: tinyllama:1.1b, phi:2.7b, etc. are recommended.

faq8.question: What port number should I choose?
faq8.answer: The default 8080 is fine. If another application is using it, please select a different port number such as 8081, 8082, etc.

faq9.question: Do I need to enable authentication?
faq9.answer: If you're only using it in a local environment, you can disable authentication. If you're using it from external applications, we recommend enabling authentication.

faq10.question: Where can I check the API key?
faq10.answer: It is displayed on the success screen when creating the API. You can also check it from the "Details" button on the API details screen. You can also regenerate the API key on the settings change screen.

guide1.title: First Launch
guide1.content0: 1. When you launch the FLM application, it first checks the status of Ollama
guide1.content1: 2. If Ollama is not installed, it will automatically download it (recommended)
guide1.content2: 3. You can also use an already installed Ollama
guide1.content3: 4. Click the "Download Ollama" button to check the download progress

guide2.title: Creating an API
guide2.content0: Step 1: Click the "Create New API" button on the home screen
guide2.content1: Step 2: Select the model you want to use (recommended models are highlighted)
guide2.content2: Step 3: Enter API settings (API name, port number, authentication settings)
guide2.content3: Step 4: Click the "Create" button to start the API creation process
guide2.content4: Step 5: Check the API endpoint and API key (if authentication is enabled) on the success screen
guide2.content5: Important: The API key is only displayed at creation time. Please save it in a safe place

guide3.title: Using the API
guide3.content0: 1. Select "API List" from the home screen or menu
guide3.content1: 2. A list of created APIs will be displayed
guide3.content2: 3. Click the "Start" button to start the API
guide3.content3: 4. Use the API endpoint and API key to use the API in OpenAI-compatible format
guide3.content4: 5. You can test the API directly from the "Test" button
guide3.content5: 6. You can check request logs on the "Logs" screen

guide4.title: Model Management
guide4.content0: 1. Select "Model Management" from the home screen
guide4.content2: 3. You can delete models from the installed models list
guide4.content3: 4. Download time varies depending on model size (small: a few minutes, medium: 10-30 minutes, large: 1 hour or more)

guide5.title: Performance Monitoring
guide5.content0: 1. Select "Performance Monitoring" from the home screen
guide5.content1: 2. Select the API you want to monitor from the API selection dropdown
guide5.content3: 4. Check graphs for response time, request count, CPU/memory usage, error rate, etc.
guide5.content4: 5. Check current status with statistics summary cards

trouble1.title: Ollama won't start
trouble1.solution0: Restart the application and check Ollama status
trouble1.solution1: Start Ollama manually (run `ollama serve` from command line)
trouble1.solution2: Check if port 11434 is being used by another application

trouble2.title: API won't start
trouble2.symptom0: Doesn't start even when clicking the "Start" button
trouble2.solution1: Check if the port number is in use (check for port conflicts with other applications)
trouble2.solution3: Restart the application and try again

trouble3.title: Model download fails
trouble3.solution1: Check if there's sufficient storage space (minimum 10GB)
trouble3.solution3: If it fails after several attempts, manually download the Ollama model

trouble4.title: Forgot API key
trouble4.solution0: Check API key from the "Details" button on the API details screen
trouble4.solution1: Click the "Regenerate API Key" button on the settings change screen
trouble4.solution2: Note: The old API key will become invalid

trouble5.title: Don't understand error message
trouble5.solution1: Check the troubleshooting section of this help page
trouble5.solution2: Restart the application and try again
trouble5.solution3: If the problem persists, report it on GitHub Issues

trouble6.title: Poor performance
trouble6.solution0: This is normal behavior. LLM inference processing uses a lot of CPU and memory
trouble6.solution2: If multiple APIs are running simultaneously, stop unnecessary APIs
trouble6.solution3: Close other applications to free up resources

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.intro: Use the following keyboard shortcuts to operate quickly.

ollama.notFound: Ollama was not found. Please go to the home screen and run "Ollama Setup" to download Ollama.
ollama.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to Ollama. Please check if Ollama is running.
ollama.startFailed: Failed to start Ollama. Please check if Ollama is installed correctly.
ollama.general: An error occurred with Ollama. Please check Ollama settings.
ollama.suggestion: Please check if Ollama is installed correctly and running.

api.portInUse: This port number is already in use. An alternative port will be automatically detected, but you can also manually specify a different port number.
api.portInvalid: Please enter a port number between {{min}} and {{max}}.
api.portNotFound: No available port numbers were found. Another application may be using many ports. Please close unnecessary applications and try again.
api.authProxyStartFailedPort: Failed to start authentication proxy. The port number may already be in use. Please try a different port number.
api.authProxyStartFailed: Failed to start authentication proxy. Please restart the application and try again.
api.general: An error occurred with the API. Please check the settings.
api.suggestion: Please check if the port number is already in use and verify the settings.

model.notFound: Model was not found. Please download the model and try again.
model.downloadFailed: Model download failed. Please check your internet connection.
model.general: An error occurred with the model. Please check the model settings.
model.suggestion: Please check if the model is downloaded correctly.

database.locked: Database is in use. Please wait a moment and try again.
database.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to the database. Please restart the application.
database.general: An error occurred with the database. Please restart the application.

network.general: There is a problem with the network connection. Please check your internet connection.
network.timeout: La requête a expiré. Veuillez vérifier votre connexion réseau.
network.connectionFailed: Échec de la connexion réseau. Veuillez vérifier votre connexion Internet.
network.retryFailed: Échec de la connexion après nouvelle tentative. Veuillez vérifier votre connexion réseau.

permission.general: Required permissions are missing. Please check permission settings.
permission.suggestion: Please check if you have the required permissions.

validation.general: There is an error in the input. Please check the input.
validation.maxLength: Please enter no more than {{max}} characters.
validation.pattern: Please enter in the correct format.
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address format.
validation.urlInvalid: Please enter a valid URL format.
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.dateInvalid: Please enter a valid date format.

suggestion.general: If the problem persists, please try restarting the application.

ollama.detectionFailed: Failed to detect Ollama: {{errorMessage}}. Please run "Ollama Setup" from the home screen or install from the official Ollama website (https://ollama.com).
ollama.installMessage: Please run "Ollama Setup" from the home screen or install from the official Ollama website (https://ollama.com).

lmStudio.installMessage: Please install from the LM Studio official website (https://lmstudio.ai).

vllm.installMessage: Please install vLLM as a Python package (pip install vllm) or as a Docker container.

llamaCpp.installMessage: Please install llama.cpp in your system PATH.

general.installMessage: Please install {{engineName}} before selecting a model.

starting.waitMessage: Please wait while the engine starts. This may take a while.
